[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1645 and today's date is August
22nd 2018 and the title the episode is
the world is now preparing for the
economic transition let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now
we've been tracking this economy for
quite a while and what we've noticed
here is that the indicators the economic
indicators
they've been deteriorating quite rapidly
they've picked up since about last year
or so and things are starting to
accelerate yes the statistical numbers
like GDP unemployment all the rest where
they can completely manipulate it change
the calculations yet those are gonna
look fantastic the stock market is going
to look fantastic until the very last
minute think about go back in time think
about every time we had a problem in the
economy and the whole thing just came
tumbling down everyone thought this is
the best economy ever it's never going
to fail it's incredible it's impossible
housing prices are not gonna come down
it's not going to crash the stock market
hitting 14,000 points this was back in
2008 why would this come down now it
makes no sense companies are very very
strong the same thing is happening right
now but we've been what we've been doing
we've been looking at all these
different indicators and we've been
watching we've been observing and we are
realizing that this system is about to
implode on itself and they're doing
whatever they possibly can to convince
everyone that everything is great and
there's a reason for it there's a plan
in place and when we start to look at
these economic indicators like housing
housing is a very big one because this
is the middle class here their wealth is
tied up in real estate and when the
middle-class feel that real estate is
not doing well they contract and once
they contract that means they're not
going to spend money anymore
and this is exactly what is happening
when the real estate market is doing
well a lot of people refinance
or take out equity lines of credit and
they pull their funds out of the house
because they're expecting the house
prices to continually move up but when
this doesn't happen guess what this part
of the spending dries up and the younger
generation the next generation coming up
they don't have the jobs to support the
housing market they're not out there
purchasing houses especially with
interest rates moving up right now and
this is completely evident when we look
at new home sales pending home sales and
we just received the information for
existing home sales and they are not
doing well we know back in June we had
really bad US housing data everyone was
hoping for a rebound in July and it
didn't come existing home sales tumbled
0.7 percent month on month it was
expected to go up by 0.4% way off now
this is the longest streak of declines
since the taper tantrum in 2013
single-family home sales fell by 0.2%
month on month one it's down 1.2 percent
year-on-year
think about what is happening right now
we are in the summer months this is when
people purchase homes they move in right
before school they try to get settled
it's warm whether they want to move
during warm weather they want to get
into the house before the kids go off to
school guess what it's not happening the
purchases of condominiums and co-op
units drop by 4.8% month on month it's
down 3.3% year-on-year and housing
prices they are starting to come down
and what's very interesting housing
prices were moving up and up and up and
this is the inflating of the bubble and
now they're starting to come down a
little bit why well interest rates they
are moving up people can't afford these
homes
and the bubble is popping not just here
in the US but around the world we see
the sentiment for home buying conditions
are the worst since Lehman and whenever
we see this when whenever we see the you
much home buying conditions drop to the
level that they are guess what hits a
recession and this is what is happening
right now the entire system is breaking
apart but this is the plan the plan is
not to have this economy continue on the
way it is the plan is to bring it down
but there's two different plans there is
a plan by the central bank in the deep
state and there's a plan by Trump and
the Patriots and these two plans are
working right now and eventually what's
going to happen is one of these plans
are going to be the winner and we can
see right now that Trump in the Patriots
they are pushing their plan to the
extreme and the Fed they're kind of
caught up in all this because they don't
know what to do at this point because
now Trump is calling out the Fed saying
listen look what you're doing with the
interest rates look what's happening
here now Trump is looking to bring the
dollar lower and we could see right now
this is going to be a huge problem for
the Fed and eventually what's going to
happen is the Fed is going to be taken
over most likely it's going to be
nationalized and we see that there are
countries out there they know exactly
what is going on they understand that
the dollar is not going to remain the
reserve currency of the world forever
they know there's too much debt they
know that you need gold to build
confidence in your country they know
they need to get rid of debt they know
that you need to separate themselves
from the entire system because when the
system comes down anyone that's tied to
it anyone that depends on it
well they're going down with it and we
can see with Russia right now they've
bought about a eight hundred and thirty
nine thousand ounces of gold in July and
their entire treasury holdings
has dropped now their gold holdings they
total around 76 billion they dumped
around 90 billion of US Treasuries in
April and May and what we're seeing here
is that Russia is trying to detach from
the US dollar based system they created
their own payment system they trade with
many other countries using their
national currencies they're moving away
from Adela
China's doing the same thing there are
many turkeys doing the same thing then
as well as doing the same thing there's
a lot of countries out there that are
moving away from the dollar because they
understand what is happening here and
China and Russia they have been doing
this for quite a while right now they've

looks like they're making a deal with

the dollar India has done the same and

and the rest they're all doing the same

just tiny countries in the Middle East

nations that have a huge deposit of many

from the dollar and using the you want
because they have more economic deals
with China than they do with the US and
they want to use the you wan they don't
want to use the dollar China is building
the infrastructure for many of the
African nations and the u.s. well they
have been garrison the countries to
force them into doing something they
really don't want to do and remember
many of the countries out there do not
trust the United States because over
many many years the United States I'm

talking about the people of the United
States have use force on these countries
now of course the deep state knows
people in power told us was for
democracy freedom and everything else no
it was for their system it was for the
central banking system this is why we
need to
go into a country and take over and have
regime change to keep their system in
place and a lot of countries they don't
trust the United States even with Trump
as president
they still don't trust the US because
there's been many many many many years
where they did things that these
countries do not like sanctions war
going into countries having regime
change destroying their infrastructure
and many other countries are looking at
this and saying you know something we
know it's happening we need to step away
and we're starting to see this all over
the place why do you think Trump is out
there making bilateral trade deals with
all these countries first of all it's
diversification this way this trade deal
is not affected with this trade deal and
he's setting everything up right now not
just him alone there's many other people
behind the scenes here everything is
being set up to allow the United States
to bring back manufacturing to become a

only has a very short period of time to

and the central banks had many many
years to do what they've done to our
country but we see there are other

because we see that we shouldn't be
dependent on their systems on their
payment systems now Germany's foreign

u.s. that would allow Brussels to be
independent in its financial operations
from Washington he went on to say Europe
should not allow the u.s. to act over
our heads and at our expense for that
reason it's essential that we strengthen
European
by establishing payment channels that
are independent of the u.s. creating a
European monetary fund and building up
an independent swift system and this is
not the only country that is looking to
do this there are others that are
looking to do this and there are many
others that have already done this and
Russia is still out there calling for
many nations to use their national
currencies for trade there's no reason
to use the dollar now by pushing
countries to do this they would use
their currencies to do pretty much
everything if they wanted to go to Libya
or to Iraq or to Lebanon or to Syria to

US dollars which means they don't need

reserves they would use their own
currency to buy that oil which then
poses a problem for the United States
for the central banking system for the
petro dollar system what that means is
all those dollars that have been sitting
out in all these different countries
well they're gonna head back to the
United States and everything that was
supporting the dollar the oil sales the
Full Faith and Credit of the United
States well that is going to completely
fall apart because once all those
dollars come back to the US we have this
debt problem we have inflation and
everything can't be sustained because
what is happening here is we don't have
the working base anymore to pay for the
amount of debt and the amount of
principal it's completely impossible
it's mathematically impossible and we
can see once this starts to happen
it is completely game over and it won't
take that much time because once one
country starts to do it another country
joins on think about when the petro
dollar system came about all of a sudden
in the 70s we came off the gold standard
they set up the petro dollar system in
the middle
and yes it was a couple of years but
think how quickly countries latched on
to this it won't take them that long to
get off of it and use their own
currencies especially when those
countries out in the Middle East aren't
forced to accept only the dollar
remember what's happening here that
force full organization called the deep

the central bank the deep state system
implodes this is the plan this has

the system that funded the deep state is

right now and you can't do everything

let me throw a switch and everything
just happens it's one piece at a time
but eventually what's going to happen
it's all gonna come together and people
are gonna look back and say wow look
what happened just like when we came off

but back then many of the people

I understand it now the same thing is

need to be ready and prepared for it
listen everyone thanks a lot for
